page.title: 12MEDIA COVERAGE
page.content: MEDIA COVERAGE Delivery of national newspapers is via Shawbury. These papers are only delivered to the main village and not to the outlying areas. However the regional newspaper is available to all areas, this is delivered each evening Monday to Saturday. The Shropshire Star is read widely throughout the entire region. Local radio is a recent addition and is very much appreciated by the Stanton villagers. Local and National news is given equal coverage. Television was found in most homes and is probably the most commonly used media form. Video recordings of national events is now becoming popular with farmers and those people working throughout daylight hours.
